about_the_game:
This is a fun casual shooting game where players will need to control the Pea Shooter to fire from an appropriate angle and defeat enemies from all directions. Some of them have exceptional combat power, while others have very fast movement and attack speeds.
You must kill them in a short period of time, otherwise you will be in danger of life, which greatly tests your reaction ability. It takes you into a world full of fun and excitement.
This game is famous for its interesting cartoon graphics and unique shooting mechanism, allowing you to experience unparalleled joy. In this game, you will play a brave character, facing challenges from various monsters and enemies.
By using precise shooting and strategy, you can defeat the enemy and win victory.

This game is famous for its interesting cartoon graphics and unique shooting mechanism, allowing you to experience unparalleled joy. In this game, you will play a brave character, facing challenges from various monsters and enemies.

name: Death ring

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista or higher
  • Processor: Intel i3+/AMD @ 2.4+ GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 400x, Intel HD 4x, AMD Radeon 7xxx +
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
